The Lab

Timesheetz

We will build a fully-functioning AngularJS application together over the next three days.

It is an application for tracking and updating timesheets. Woot Woot.

Teammates

  • Designers: Will provide styles and page designs.
  • Server Team: Provide a REST Api and NodeJs application server.
  • Product Owners: Provide us with requirements along the way.
  • Front End Team: This is all of us and we are awesome!
